question:
Which of the following matches of places of the great revolt with their corresponding British personnel who led the suppression are correct?
1. Delhi- John Nicholson
2. Kanpur- Colin Campbell
3. Jhansi- Hugh Rose
4. Benaras- Colonel Neill
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: The revolt in Delhi was suppressed by John Nicholson (20th September 1857). The revolt in Kanpur was suppressed by Colin Campbell (6th December 1857). The revolt in Jhansi was suppressed by Hugh Rose (June 1858). The revolt of Benaras was suppressed by Colonel Neill.
